job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.industry: Marketing and Advertising,Information Technology and Services,Information Services
job.description: pWe are seeking a site reliability engineer SRE to build and manage highly reliable data platform infrastructure and applications Specifically we are searching for someone who brings fresh ideas demonstrates a unique and informed viewpoint and enjoys collaborating with worldclass engineers to develop big data solutions and deliver positive user experiences at every interactionppbrppstrongRESPONSIBILITIESstrongpulliBuild software and systems to manage platform infrastructure and applicationsliliContinuous automation of operational processesliliProvide primary operational support and engineering for suite of SaaS toolsliliIntervene and remediate when systems and services deviate significantly from normal levelsliliWork with release engineers to ensure that the software delivery pipeline is as efficient as possibleliulpbrppstrongPREFERRED PROFILEstrongpulli35 years of relevant experience in operatingliliBSMS in Computer science or equivalentlilimediumscale distributed system in a cloud environmentliliExperience in Kubernetes Hadoop and Docker containersliliExperience in CICD  Jenkins Concourse toolsliliExperience in AWS Cloud Serverless technologiesliliExperience in building and deploying automation using scripting programming languagesliulpp
